name: Se7eN
description:
Thanks for looking at my page :D

This game was made for the Godot Wildjam #32

This game is a prototype more than actual game because of the lack of levels.

Controls are WASD or arrow keys for movement and P for pause.

Try to get the blue score to 7 and enter a goal to win the level. If you get stuck, press R to restart the level.
